      that would vary from thing to thingset

      creativity. however, there are 2 different interpretations of the logic of your question, and that's only the answer for one of those interpretations

      i did not go to the book fair

5.20.24  11:38 pm   What's a good playlist name for slow sentimental songs?

      my mush

5.20.24  11:02 pm   Why do you never use capital letters?

      i suppose the reason it may appear that way to you is if you are paying little to no attention whatsoever, especially to the on-screen text in my videos but also to the text here on the questions page

5.20.24  9:50 pm   do you think we're going to figure out immortality soon?

      i don't see why not. but it's also a pretty big life-changing thing, so i don't know if it's wise to get one's hopes up, necessarily

5.20.24  9:39 pm   3GI revealed a trailer for Shrek 2 retold, and I saw your name (that's so awesome!). I'm sure you want to keep it a surprise,

     i think that was released a couple of years ago, i don't know why they're re-releasing it now

     but was the creative process for your contribution different from the works on your channel?

     the musicification process (of 1 line) was fairly standard at the time (about 5 years ago)

5.20.24  9:02 pm   its the first day of school and i might quit, what do you think?

      i did a song about that

5.20.24  8:03 pm   why did you decide to revisit here comes the sun?

      in the case of all the writing sessions over the years, of course because it wasn't done. other than that, once i had started production on it, i never 'left' it, so thus there was no 'revisiting.' and since it's been released, i have not revisited it

5.20.24  6:51 pm   if there are mobile phones, are there stationary phones?

     yes

     and is there an in between to them

     yes, there are landline phones with a wireless handset. or, to think of it another way, you can use your mobile phone while it's plugged in, so you can't actually go very far

5.20.24  6:45 pm   which do you think is more likely; that the world ended in 2012 or that we live in a simulation?

      i guess it depends on who wins the duck-horse sized fight

5.20.24  5:43 pm   are sixtuplets real? aren't they just sixteenth triplets? am i trippin?

      'sextuplets' yes, which usually means the same thing as sixteenth note triplets. and 'sex' also means 'six' in this case, which is also the same as what you said. although none of these names are entirely specific enough, but i think the standard assumption is that simply "triplets" refers to "eighth note triplets" more specifically "3:2" eighthnote tuplets, that is 3 notes in the time where 2 eighth notes would normally fit. on the other hand, "sextuplets" is usually understood to mean "sixteenth note triplets" which is usually assumed to mean 3:2 sixteenth note tuplets, which means 3 notes fitting into the time where 2 sixteenth notes would fit. or, equivalently, 6 in the time of 4

5.20.24  3:53 pm   why do people like certain things

      because sometimes they don't

      public clocks and clocktowers everywhere ALWAYS SHOWING THE WRONG TIME you had one job

5.20.24  1:49 am   i'm frustrated by how E standard guitar tuning has that annoying major 3rd discrepancy which throws a huge wrench into the consistency of the instrument, but also by how all-fourths tuning makes most 6 string chords not viable

      if that's frustrating, wait til you see the outside world

5.20.24  1:29 am   Why do you mention rabbits more than any other non-human animal in your stuff?

5.20.24  1:02 am   What's the difference between "genre" and "style"?

      'style' is just how you do something. 'genre' is something you have to register with the government, and you also have to tell them your ethnicity

How about seeing one? (not just a depiction of one)

      absolutely insane

      almost any way except whatever i mention, but you could try drawing a picture

5.19.24  9:54 pm   what is the meaning of life?

      when 1+1 has a slightly different quality than you expected

5.19.24  8:53 pm   i have dreams where i have to get some task done and i keep getting sidetracked and roadblocked and so on and so forth and i end up waking up before i make any real progress on the important task. and sometimes i'm scared that the same thing is happening with my life. every day i do things and ostensibly make progress, but i'm worried that in the big picture i won't have the time to do the things i really want to do, because i keep getting distracted by trivial stuff

      some people have dreams that there's no such thing as plaid. but they always wake up and it still exists

      i'm not sure

      both ways will pay off in different ways

      right. it also doesn't have to be easy

5.19.24  1:47 pm   please prove that you are not me.

      ok, i will

5.19.24  1:41 pm   tell me a joke

      telling a joke ruins it, but, ok. 3 former colleagues walked out of one bar into an adjacent bar through an interconnecting doorway between the two establishments, without having to go outside
